title: Exploring the heart and mind
creator_credit: Leslie Ann Nathan, Eve Cotton and Center for Humanities
brief_description: This program discusses the Expressionist and Surrealist artists who sought to reveal deep feelings and subconscious thoughts in their painting. It includes work by Rousseau, Redon, Rouault, Matisse, Nolde, Kirchner, Kandinski and others.
